scripts.build: export RED='\033[0;31m' && export NC='\033[0m' && export HOST=localhost && export PORT=9330 && export CLIENT_PORT=9331 &&  echo "${RED}starting dev client at port $CLIENT_PORT with server expected at $HOST:$PORT${NC}" && webpack-dev-server --inline --progress --port $CLIENT_PORT --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:prod: export RED='\033[0;31m' && export NC='\033[0m' && export HOST=localhost && export PORT=9330 && export CLIENT_PORT=9331 &&  echo "${RED}starting dev client at port $CLIENT_PORT with server expected at $HOST:$PORT${NC}" && del-cli dist && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js --progress --profile --bail
scripts.run:prod: export RED='\033[0;31m' && export NC='\033[0m' && export HOST=localhost && export PORT=9330 && export CLIENT_PORT=9332 && echo "${RED}starting prod client at $CLIENT_PORT with server expected at $HOST:$PORT${NC}" && which http-server && http-server -p $CLIENT_PORT dist
scripts.test: del-cli dist && export HOST=localhost && export PORT=9330 && webpack --config webpack.config.test.js --progress  --profile --bail && karma start --single-run
